summary: The document is a payroll certification for the U.S. House of Representatives' Select Committee on Assassinations, dated January 6, 1978. It details the salaries and positions of various employees for the accounting period from December 1, 1977, to December 31, 1977. The document includes employee names, social security numbers, job titles, annual salaries, gross pay earned for the period, and remarks regarding payroll changes or appointments.
key_findings: The payroll includes a wide range of positions such as Staff Counsel, Staff Investigator, Researcher, Chief Counsel and Director, and various clerical and administrative roles.
Salary limits for the period were set at a minimum of $1,200.00 and a maximum of $47,500.00.
Several entries note payroll changes or appointments effective December 1, 1977, and some employees were terminated as of November 30, 1977.
The document provides a detailed snapshot of the staffing and financial operations of the Select Committee on Assassinations during this period.
